evidence_collection.quote_text: We are fellow Americans, and please believe me when I say no association has ever meant more to me than that.
evidence_collection.context_type: implicit in-group identity, immediately followed by call for broader unity

evidence_collection.quote_text: There is no better evidence of this than the election of an African-American to the presidency of the United States.
evidence_collection.context_type: celebration of universal opportunity and overcoming historical injustice

evidence_collection.quote_text: These are difficult times for our country, and I pledge to him tonight to do all in my power to help him lead us through the many challenges we face.
evidence_collection.context_type: acknowledgment of challenges without existential threat framing

evidence_collection.quote_text: believe always in the promise and greatness of America.
evidence_collection.context_type: direct statement of optimism and future orientation

evidence_collection.quote_text: His success alone commands my respect for his ability and perseverance. But that he managed to do so by inspiring the hopes of so many millions of Americans who had once wrongly believed that they had little at stake or little influence in the election of an American president is something I deeply admire and commend him for achieving.
evidence_collection.context_type: explicit admiration and commendation for opponent's success

evidence_collection.quote_text: I wish Godspeed to the man who was my former opponent and will be my President
evidence_collection.context_type: explicit rejection of adversarial relationship, embracing opponent as future leader

evidence_collection.quote_text: We are fellow Americans, and please believe me when I say no association has ever meant more to me than that.
evidence_collection.context_type: strong emphasis on shared national identity and unity

evidence_collection.quote_text: to find ways to come together, to find the necessary compromises to bridge our differences and help restore our prosperity, defend our security in a dangerous world, and leave our children and grandchildren a stronger, better country than we inherited.
evidence_collection.context_type: clear articulation of unifying national objectives for the future

evidence_collection.quote_text: The American people are outraged at what's going on, and the American people are saying loud and clear, 'We will not accept an oligarchic form of society.'
Now everybody wants to do well in life. Everybody wants to make money.
They are prepared to destroy Social Security, Medicaid, Medicare, the Veterans Administration in order to make themselves even richer.

if we stand together, are strong, are disciplined, are smart, I have every reason to believe deeply in my heart that not only will we defeat Trumpism, but we can create the kind of nation that we deserve.
evidence_collection.context_type: call to collective action for positive future

evidence_collection.quote_text: Meanwhile, there has been a $75 trillion transfer of wealth from the bottom 90% to the top 1%. That is what a rigged economy is about, and that is what we are going to change.

We will not accept an oligarchic form of society. We will not accept the richest guy in the world running all over Washington... Trump has a government of the billionaires, by the billionaires, and for the billionaires.

I don't care if you are a Republican, Democrat, or independent, I don't think there's anybody who thinks it vaguely makes sense that the richest guy in the world could spend $270 million to get Trump elected.
evidence_collection.context_type: attempt to find common ground against a shared enemy

evidence_collection.quote_text: They are prepared to destroy Social Security, Medicaid, Medicare, the Veterans Administration in order to make themselves even richer.

if we stand together, are strong, are disciplined, are smart, I have every reason to believe deeply in my heart that not only will we defeat Trumpism, but we can create the kind of nation that we deserve.

evidence_collection.quote_text: It's another life loss to an, an illegal criminal alien who was unlawfully present in America, who had no business to be here...

It's another life loss to an, an illegal criminal alien who was unlawfully present in America... This happens every day in this country... it's costing lives in America. And it's costing, it's costing in the end thousands of lives in America.
Lord, wake me up with an idea on how to, how to preserve our Constitution
illegal alien... who had no business being in America in the first place...

lame duck President," "criminal alien," "perpetrator," "Supreme Court created a new command," "defies the very law," "enforcing immigration law, standing up for the rule of law. Send these people into prison. And when they're done, send them back to the country that they can live in legally for the rest of their lives if they don't stay in our prisons for the rest of their lives.
We have a Constitution to preserve, protect, defend, and support and defend.
The same billionaires are taking a wrecking ball to our country and they derive their power from dividing working people apart.

evidence_collection.quote_text: No matter who you voted for in the past. No matter if you know all the right words to say, no matter your race, religion, gender identity, or status, no matter if you disagree with me on a couple of things. evidence_collection.quote_text: They're stealing them. They're stealing them. They're stealing them from you and you and me.
